product_name: BIC Sport Wahine Shortboard Surfboard - Women's - 6' 7" - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering beginners a versatile board that you won't outgrow too soon, the 6 ft. 7 in. Bic Sport Wahine Shortboard Surfboard for women offers durable construction at a great price. Tapered nose and 6 ft. 7 in. length enhances maneuverability for riders under 154 lbs.; consistent 2.4 in. thickness adds stability. A foam core encased in thermoformed polyethylene offers excellent durability and high flotation. FCS fin system features 3 removable fins (1 center and 2 side) to aid straight tracking in the water. Closeout.
short_description: Offering beginners a versatile board that you won't outgrow too soon, the 6 ft. 7 in. Bic Sport Wahine Shortboard Surfboard for women offers durable construction at a great price.
